name: karet-express-boilerplate
description: Sample with boilerplate for a Karet + Express web app

scripts.bundle:js: sh -c "cp node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js public/generated/bundle.js && NODE_ENV=production rollup -f iife -c -i src/public/client.js >> public/generated/bundle.js"
scripts.prepare: sh -c "mkdir -p public/generated && ramda-rollup-hack && npm run bundle && npm run test"
scripts.watch: sh -c "npm run watch:server & npm run watch:js & npm run livereload:public & wait"
scripts.watch:css: sh -c "npm run bundle:css:watch && watch-run -p 'src/**/*.less' 'npm run bundle:css:watch'"
scripts.watch:js: sh -c "NODE_ENV=dev rollup -w -c --sourcemap inline -i src/public/client.js -f iife -o public/generated/bundle.js"
